content:
Vanity, Commerce, and Ownership now a well-recognized problem

  • Now a well-recognized problem

  • Generic terms: pimples.com

  • Shared trademarks

    • apple the fruit, apple music, apple computer
    • delta the airline, delta the faucet-maker

  • Migration of ownership

    • MTV.com

  • Approaches: WIPO, Authority & policy, new TLDs, relative names
